text: Safin De Coque is the Son of the Nigerian Highlife Legend Late Chief Oliver De Coque. He was mentored and blessed by his father to be a great singer. Safin De Coque was discovered and signed up in a record deal in 2011 by Kaycee Records, a UK-based recording company with a regional office in Nigeria. Unlike his father, his choice of music genre is Hiphop and his hiphop styled Identity (Remix) is his creative adaptation of his father's late 1970s hit track, Funny Funny Identity. ==References== ==External links== * Safin De Coque Official Website * KayCee Records Corporate Website Category:21st- century Nigerian musicians Category:Igbo singers Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Nigerian hip hop singers Category:Musicians from Nnewi Category:21st-century Nigerian singers
title: Safin De Coque
